steps.description: Travel to Faldir's Cove
Talk to Shakes O'Breen and turn in Sunken Treasure. Accept Death From Below
Quickly walk up the ramp onto the ship
Click the Cannon when you see incoming waves of attacking Nagas from the south
Talk to Shakes O'Breen and turn in Death From Below
Logout on top of the rock in the cave, then log back in

tips.text: Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Cedrik Prose and fly to The Hinterlands
Talk to Gryphon Master Talonaxe and accept Witherbark Cages
Talk to Fraggar Thundermantle, accept Troll Necklace Bounty, and turn in Troll Necklace Bounty
Talk to Fraggar Thundermantle and accept Troll Necklace Bounty
Loot the Wildkin Feathers on the ground
Talk to Rhapsody Shindigger, turn in Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail, and accept Rhapsody's Tale
Kill Witherbark Trolls. Loot them for their Tribal Necklaces
Click the Third Witherbark Cage
Click the First Witherbark Cage and Second Witherbark Cage
Kill Witherbark Trolls. Loot them for their Tribal Necklaces
Talk to Fraggar Thundermantle and turn in Troll Necklace Bounty
Talk to Gryphon Master Talonaxe, turn in Witherbark Cages, and accept The Altar of Zul

Clear your way to the top of The Altar of Zul. Ensure you are on full HP before you reach the top. Run to the exploration location, then jump off to the side to evade the Elites at the top. Wait on the ledge until you have dropped Combat. Watch the video below for an example

tips.text: Click here for video reference

steps.description: Loot the Sack of Rye on the ground
Loot the Wildkin Feathers on the ground. These are scattered on the ground throughout all of The Hinterlands
Talk to Gryphon Master Talonaxe, turn in The Altar of Zul, and accept Thadius Grimshade
Talk to Guthrum Thunderfist and fly to Ironforge
Talk to Prospector Stormpike and accept The Lost Dwarves
Talk to Krom Stoutarm and accept Reclaimed Treasures
Talk to Binjy Featherwhistle and train Mechanostrider Piloting. Talk to Milli Featherwhistle and buy a Mechanostrider
Talk to Veron Amberstill and buy a Ram. Talk to Ultham Ironhorn and train Ram Riding
Talk to Briarthorn and train your class spells
Talk to Fenthwick and train your class spells
Talk to Toldren Deepiron and train your class spells
Talk to Dink and train your class spells
Talk to Brandur Ironhammer and train your class spells
Talk to Regnus Thundergranite and train your class spells
Talk to Bilban Tosslespanner and train your class spells
Talk to Jubahl Corpseseeker. Buy Grimoires for your pets

Talk to an Ironforge Auctioneer. Buy the following from the Auction House. This step is optional and will allow you to complete a few extra quests if you have the items: Frost Oil, Gyrochronatom (Don't buy this unless you have a Frost Oil), Patterned Bronze Bracers (Don't buy this unless you have a Gyrochronatom and Frost Oil), Healing Potion and Lesser Invisibility Potion (Don't buy this unless you have a Gyrochronatom and Frost Oil)
Talk to Bailey Stonemantle. Withdraw the following items from your bank: 15 Silk Cloth (If you have them)
Talk to Bailey Stonemantle. Deposit the following items from your bank: Sack of Rye, Wildkin Feather, Sharpbeak's Feather
Talk to an Ironforge Auctioneer. Buy the following from the Auction House: Silk Cloth
Talk to Gryth Thurden and fly to Loch Modan
Talk to Ghak Healtouch and accept Uldaman Reagent Run
Talk to Prospector Ironband and accept Agmond's Fate
Travel to Badlands
Click the Crumpled Map on the ground and accept A Sign of Hope
Talk to Prospector Ryedol, turn in A Sign of Hope, and accept A Sign of Hope
Talk to Garek and accept Tremors of the Earth
Kill Boss Tho'grun. Loot him for his Sign of the Earth. Boss Tho'grun patrols across all of Badlands

tips.text: Boss Tho'grun patrols across all of Badlands

steps.description: Talk to Garek and turn in Tremors of the Earth
Talk to Theldurin the Lost and accept The Lost Fragments
Talk to Theldurin the Lost and accept Solution to Doom
Kill Enraged Rock Elementals. Loot them for their Scroll Fragments
Talk to Theldurin the Lost and turn in The Lost Fragments
Talk to Lotwil Veriatus and accept Study of the Elements: Rock
You will run Uldaman after completing this quest. Start trying to find a group for Uldaman now
Kill Greater Rock Elementals. Loot them for their Bracers
Talk to Lotwil Veriatus and turn in Study of the Elements: Rock
Talk to Lotwil Veriatus, accept Coolant Heads Prevail, and turn in Coolant Heads Prevail
Talk to Lotwil Veriatus, accept Gyro... What?, and turn in Gyro... What?
Talk to Lotwil Veriatus and accept This Is Going to Be Hard

quests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard

steps.description: Talk to Lucien Tosselwrench, turn in This Is Going to Be Hard, and accept This Is Going to Be Hard

quests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard
This Is Going to Be Hard

steps.description: Talk to Lucien Tosselwrench, accept Stone Is Better than Cloth, and turn in Stone Is Better than Cloth
Talk to Lucien Tosselwrench, accept Liquid Stone, and turn in Liquid Stone
Talk to Lotwil Veriatus, turn in This Is Going to Be Hard, and accept This Is Going to Be Hard

quests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard
This Is Going to Be Hard

steps.description: Kill the Fam'Retor Guardian. Loot it for its Shackles

quests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard

steps.description: Talk to Lotwil Veriatus and turn in This Is Going to Be Hard

quests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard

steps.description: Grind Ogres and Greater Rock Elementals while looking for a group for Uldaman
Travel to Uldaman
Loot the Carved Stone Urns on the ground. This can be only be completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

tips.text: This can be only be completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

steps.description: Loot the Magenta Fungus Caps on the ground. This can be completed INSIDE and OUTSIDE of Uldaman

tips.text: This can be completed INSIDE and OUTSIDE of Uldaman

steps.description: Talk to Hammertoe Grez, turn in A Sign of Hope, and accept Amulet of Secrets
Kill Magregan Deepshadow. Loot him for Hammertoe's Amulet. This is completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

steps.description: Open the Ancient Chest. Loot it for the Tablet of Ryun'eh. This is completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

steps.description: Loot Krom Stoutarm's Treasure on the ground. This is completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

steps.description: Talk to Hammertoe Grez, turn in Amulet of Secrets, and accept Prospect of Faith
Loot the Carved Stone Urns and Magenta Fungus Caps on the ground.

tips.text: Prioritize the Carved Stone Urns. This can only be completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman. You can finish the Magenta Fungus Caps once inside

steps.description: Loot the Carved Stone Urns on the ground.

tips.text: This can be only be completed OUTSIDE of Uldaman

steps.description: Zone into Uldaman
Loot the Magenta Fungus Caps on the ground
Talk to Baelog, turn in The Lost Dwarves, and accept The Hidden Chamber
Talk to Baelog and accept The Hidden Chamber
Open Baelog's Chest. Loot it for the Gni'kiv Medallion. Kill Revelosh. Loot him for The Shaft of Tsol.

tips.text: Note other party members can loot these items, and then combine them to create the Staff of Prehistoria. Only one person in the group needs to do this

steps.description: Use the Gni'kiv Medallion and The Shaft of Tsol to combine them into the Staff of Prehistoria. Use the Staff of Prehistoria on the Keystone to summon Ironaya. Kill Ironaya. Run into the Hidden Chamber she came from after

tips.text: Use the Gni'kiv Medallion and The Shaft of Tsol to combine them into the Staff of Prehistoria
Use the Staff of Prehistoria on the Keystone to summon Ironaya

steps.description: Loot the Magenta Fungus Caps on the ground
Kill Archaedas. Click The Discs of Norgannon and accept The Platinum Discs
Talk to Lore Keeper of Norgannon
Click The Discs of Norgannon, turn in The Platinum Discs, and accept The Platinum Discs
Use the Shattered Necklace to start the quest and accept The Shattered Necklace

tips.text: Use the Shattered Necklace to start the quest

steps.description: Zone out of Uldaman together as a group to turn in quests in Badlands. The closest exit is the Uldaman backdoor
Talk to Theldurin the Lost and turn in Solution to Doom
Talk to Prospector Ryedol and turn in Prospect of Faith. Accept Prospect of Faith
Travel to Loch Modan
Talk to Prospector Ironband and turn in Agmond's Fate
Talk to Ghak Healtouch and turn in Uldaman Reagent Run
Talk to Thorgrum Borrelson and fly to Ironforge
Talk to High Explorer Magellas, turn in The Platinum Discs, and accept The Platinum Discs
Talk to Prospector Stormpike and turn in The Hidden Chamber
Talk to Krom Stoutarm and turn in Reclaimed Treasures

Talk to Historian Karnik and Advisor Belgrum, turn in Prospect of Faith, accept Passing Word of a Threat, turn in Passing Word of a Threat, accept Passing Word of a Threat, turn in Passing Word of a Threat, and accept An Ambassador of Evil

Talk to Historian Karnik and Advisor Belgrum, turn in Prospect of Faith, accept Passing Word of a Threat, turn in Passing Word of a Threat, accept Passing Word of a Threat, and turn in Passing Word of a Threat
Talk to Dinita Stonemantle and turn in The Platinum Discs
Talk to Talvash del Kissel and turn in The Shattered Necklace
Talk to Talvash del Kissel and accept Lore for a Price
Talk to Talvash del Kissel. Bring 5 Silver Bars to Talvash del Kissel and turn in Lore for a Price.

tips.text: If you are unable to acquire them, abandon this quest

steps.description: Talk to Gryth Thurden and fly to Loch Modan
Abandon Lore for a Price
Travel to Badlands
Enter Angor Fortress
Kill Ambassador Infernus. Loot him for Ambassador Infernus' Bracer. Ambassador Infernus is on the lower level

tips.text: Ambassador Infernus is on the lower level

steps.description: Travel to Searing Gorge
Click on the Wooden Outhouse and accept Caught!
Kill Dark Iron Geologists. Loot them for their Silk Cloth if you still need more
Click on the Wooden Outhouse, turn in Caught!, and accept Ledger from Tanaris
Loot the Goodsteel Ledger on the ground
Kill Glassweb Spiders. Loot them for their Solid Crystal Leg Shafts. Prioritize on completing the next steps escort quest. If he isn't there kill Glassweb Spiders while waiting

tips.text: Prioritize on completing the next steps escort quest. If he isn't there kill Glassweb Spiders while waiting

steps.description: Talk to Dorius Stonetender and accept Suntara Stones. This will start an escort. Clear the surrounding area of the pit before accepting this quest

tips.text: This will start an escort. Clear the surrounding area of the pit before accepting this quest

steps.description: Kill Glassweb Spiders. Loot them for their Solid Crystal Leg Shafts
Escort Dorius to the Loch Modan Pass Gate
Click the Singed Letter on the ground, turn in Suntara Stones, and accept Suntara Stones.

tips.text: If the Singed Letter has not spawned, you will need to abandon Suntara Stones and complete the escort again. This is a bug with WoW Classic

steps.description: Kill Glassweb Spiders. Loot them for their Solid Crystal Leg Shafts
Travel to Thorium Point
Talk to Lanie Reed. Get the Thorium Point flight path and fly to Ironforge
Teleport to Ironforge
Talk to High Explorer Magellas and Historian Karnik, accept Portents of Uldum, turn in Portents of Uldum, and accept Seeing What Happens
Talk to Advisor Belgrum and turn in An Ambassador of Evil
Talk to Curator Thorius and turn in Suntara Stones. Curator Thorius patrols through the Hall of Explorers

tips.text: Curator Thorius patrols through the Hall of Explorers

steps.description: Enter the Deeprun Tram. Take the Tram to Stormwind City
Talk to Lanie Reed. Get the Thorium Point flight path and fly to Stormwind
Teleport to Stormwind
Talk to Brohann Caskbelly and turn in Rhapsody's Tale
Abandon An Ambassador of Evil
Talk to Newton Burnside. Withdraw the following items from your bank: Sack of Barley, Sack of Corn, Sack of Rye, Undelivered Parcel, OOX-22/FE Distress Beacon (If you have it)
Talk to Newton Burnside. Deposit the following items into your bank: Solid Crystal Leg Shaft, Goodsteel Ledger, Singed Letter (If you have it)
Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon. Buy a Truesilver Bar and 2 Elixir of Fortitudes. Skip this step if you aren't able to aquire them

tips.text: Skip this step if you aren't able to aquire them

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Westfall
Talk to Grimbooze Thunderbrew and turn in Sweet Amber
Talk to Grimbooze Thunderbrew, accept Sweet Amber, and turn in Sweet Amber
Talk to Grimbooze Thunderbrew and accept Sweet Amber
Hearth to Feathermoon Stronghold
Talk to Angelas Moonbreeze and accept The Sunken Temple
Grind to level 47. Kill Hatecrest Nagas until you loot the OOX-22/FE Distress Beacon.

tips.text: Use the OOX-22/FE Distress Beacon to start the quest
If you don't find it by the time you are 47, skip it

steps.description: Use the OOX-22/FE Distress Beacon to start the quest and accept Find OOX-22/FE!

tips.text: Use the OOX-22/FE Distress Beacon to start the quest

steps.description: Swim to the mainland
Talk to the Homing Robot OOX-22/FE and turn in Find OOX-22/FE!

tips.text: Do NOT accept the follow up and attempt to do the Escort, unless you are in a group

steps.description: Talk to the Homing Robot OOX-22/FE and accept Rescue OOX-22/FE!
Escort the Homing Robot OOX-22/FE to safety
Kill a Cursed Sycamore. Loot it for its Sycamore Branch.

tips.text: The Cursed Sycamore patrol path is marked on your map
If you cannot find the Cursed Sycamore but instead see a Wandering Forest Walker, kill it and wait until a Cursed Sycamore spawns. There can only ever be one of these alive at a time

steps.description: Loot a Hippogryph Egg from a nest
Talk to Kindal Moonweaver and accept An Orphan Looking For a Home

quests.name: An Orphan Looking For a Home

steps.description: Talk to Falfindel Waywarder and turn in Thalanaar Delivery
Talk to Thyssiana and fly to Tanaris
